FuncDef: The valid lifetime for the IPv6 prefix or address in the option, expressed in units of seconds.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the valid lifetime is infinite.
Specifies the number of days of a valid lifetime. Values-0 to 49710.
Specifies the number of hours of a valid lifetime. Values-0 to 23.
Specifies the number of minutes of a valid lifetime. Values-0 to 59.
Specifies the number of seconds of a valid lifetime. Values-0 to 59.
